snippet: The army called the shooting at a checkpoint a case of mistaken identity.
abstract: Indian Army takes responsibility for the killing of two teenagers at security checkpoint in the Indian-administered portion of Kashmir, promising full investigation.
lead_paragraph: The army called the shooting at a checkpoint a case of mistaken identity.

headline.main: Indian Army Takes Responsibility for Killing 2 Civilians in Kashmir
headline.print_headline: India: Army Accepts Blame for Kashmir Shootings
